document.title: Viewing information about a class
document.paragraph:
1Viewing information about a class Once you
10_centering_tools_on_a_component.xml centered the editor on a class, you have access to its
../../../reference/80_formatters/10_class_formatters/05_basic_text_format.xml basic text . If the class is compiled, the
../../../reference/10_browsing_tools/30_feature_tool/00_introduction.xml feature tool shows the list of the features that are defined or redefined in this text. You can also view
../../../reference/80_formatters/10_class_formatters/10_clickable_format.xml clickable ,
../../../reference/80_formatters/10_class_formatters/15_flat_format.xml flat ,
../../../reference/80_formatters/10_class_formatters/25_interface_format.xml flat contract and
../../../reference/80_formatters/10_class_formatters/20_contract_format.xml contract views of the class in the editor. The class tab in the context tool can display more information. If the
10_centering_tools_on_a_component.xml context tool is independent ,
10_centering_tools_on_a_component.xml center it on the wanted class and select this tab. You can then see information about the features (
../../../reference/80_formatters/10_class_formatters/55_routines_format.xml routines ,
../../../reference/80_formatters/10_class_formatters/50_attributes_format.xml attributes ,
../../../reference/80_formatters/10_class_formatters/75_exported_format.xml exported features,
../../../reference/80_formatters/10_class_formatters/index.xml etc. ..) of the class, its
../../../reference/80_formatters/10_class_formatters/30_ancestors_format.xml ancestors and
../../../reference/80_formatters/10_class_formatters/35_descendants_format.xml descendants or its
../../../reference/80_formatters/10_class_formatters/40_clients_format.xml clients and
../../../reference/80_formatters/10_class_formatters/45_suppliers_format.xml suppliers . The
../../../reference/60_metric_tool/00_introduction.xml metric tool provides another kind of data. It allows you to compute a complete set of
../../70_analyzing_a_project/00_introduction.xml measures on your class.
